name: AnyImage for Instagram
description: AnyImage is a small utility app which modifies images so you can share them on Instagram without cropping them!   - Any non square image will be modified in to a square image containing the full asset. - The convenient screenshot share option makes it very easy to share any non square image to Instagram. - Use the automatically picked background color or choose your own!   Like NeoTech Software on Facebook and support us! http://www.facebook.com/neotechsoftware   Wed love to hear your suggestions and comments!
